nodes.text: A Mradhe was a species of creature which created muck. The Bothan crime lord Akris Ur'etu used Mradhe muck as a phrase to describe a question asked by a Weequay security chief of his as stupid.

Mradhes were first mentioned in the short story Reputation written by
Ari Marmell and illustrated by Tom Hodges which was published in Star Wars Insider 136 in 2012.
